description: Design, develop, test, and maintain software applications using languages like Java, Python, or C++. Experience with version control, databases, and debugging tools is essential.
Analyze large datasets using SQL, Excel, and Python. Create dashboards and reports using tools like Tableau or Power BI. Strong statistical and analytical skills required.
Build and deploy machine learning models using Python, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch. Familiarity with data preprocessing, model evaluation, and cloud ML deployment is preferred.
Develop server-side logic using Node.js, Django, Flask, or Spring Boot. Experience with REST APIs, databases (SQL/NoSQL), authentication, and deployment is required.
Build responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frontend frameworks like React or Angular. Understanding of design principles and REST API integration is important.
Manage CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and cloud deployments using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and AWS. Knowledge of system monitoring and scripting is essential.
Work on both frontend and backend development using technologies like React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Experience in REST APIs, Git, and deployment is crucial.
Perform exploratory data analysis, build predictive models, and communicate insights using Python, R, SQL, and data visualization tools. Proficiency in statistics and ML is necessary.
Design and manage cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure, or GCP. Experience with virtualization, networking, cloud security, and automation tools like Terraform is required.
Develop intelligent systems using NLP, computer vision, and deep learning. Work with Python, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, and large-scale datasets. Research and deploy AI models.
